pkgmetadata.longdescription: Forest Estimations and Dendrometric Computations // Computation of dendrometric and structural parameters from forest inventory data. The objective is to provide an user-friendly R package for researchers, ecologists, foresters, statisticians, loggers and others persons who deal with forest inventory data. Useful conversion of angle value from degree to radian, conversion from angle to slope (in percentage) and their reciprocals as well as principal angle determination are also included. Position and dispersion parameters usually found in forest studies are implemented. The package contains Fibonacci series, its extensions and the Golden Number computation. Useful references are Arcadius Y. J. Akossou, Soufianou Arzouma, Eloi Y. Attakpa, Nol H. Fonton and Kouami Kokou (2013) doi:10.3390/d5010099 and W. Bonou, R. Glele Kaka, A.E. Assogbadjo, H.N. Fonton, B. Sinsin (2009) doi:10.1016/j.foreco.2009.05.032 .
